characters.behavior: crossing the road from right to left
stopped on the right side of the road

summary: The self-driving car is moving forward on a city street with moderate traffic. From 0.0s to 7.0s, the car is driving at a speed between 45km/h and 32km/h. At 8.0s, a male adult on a red scooter suddenly appears from behind a bus on the right side of the road, crossing from right to left. The scooter is moving at a moderate speed. From 8.0s to 11.9s, the car decelerates from 32km/h to 24km/h. The bus is stopped on the right side of the road.
actions: From 0.0s to 7.0s, the vehicle is moving forward at a speed between 45km/h and 32km/h. The vehicle is slowing down, likely due to the presence of other vehicles ahead and the upcoming intersection. From 8.0s to 11.9s, the vehicle decelerates from 32km/h to 24km/h, likely in response to the scooter suddenly appearing from behind the bus.
key_objects: Right side: A male adult on a red scooter, approximately 10 meters away, crossing the road from behind a bus, causing the vehicle to decelerate.
